dialogue.String: 1�Sparkling clear water bubbles up from the ground.If you have a container, you can fill it here.
1�You fill your flask with water.
1�Good! We are taking smoothskin's food offering.Quawk! But now you must be leaving! Quawk!
1�Quaawk!?Smoothskin wants to take back offering?
1�Quawk! You be pulling my talon, no?Crawl away now, cheating smoothskin, before I be making feathers fly!
1�Pesky! Pesky! Quawk!You wanting it back so much, then you be going to treasure chamber directly yourself!All offerings taken from altars be gathered there!
1�That is, if smoothskin survives long enough to make it there.Quawk-quawk-quawk!
1�Quawk! Smoothskin not bringing food offering?Quawk! Smoothskin leave now!
1�You be coming long way to deliver this, kyah?You be telling other smoothskins to keep offerings coming!Kyah-kyah-kyah!
1�Kyah!? Smoothskin wants to take offering back?Smoothskin wanting to destroy friendship, kyah?
1�Altars be directly connecting to treasure chamber.
1�Kyah! Smoothskin wanting it back so much, then smoothskin be crawling to treasure chamber on own hands and feets!
1�We be not caring for your reasons.My brethren will not be taking this intrusion quietly!Kyah-kyah-kyah!
1�Kyah! No time for smoothskins who carry no food offering!You be crawling away now, before my brethren sacrifice you instead! Kyah!
1�What be this? Hoot!This blunt blade is useless!
1�Never do! Hoot! No, never do!You be bringing weapon more fitting for Uu Zhoumo!
1�What kind of weapon be more fitting? Hoot! A weapon like Eyy Mon the Ironbreaker be using!Hoot! That be more fitting for likes of me!
1�You think so too?Hoot! Then you be go bringing me one now!
1�Hoot! That be it!Look at it shine! Hoot!This truly be a weapon fitting for me!
1�Deal done. Deal done. Hoot!Now you be leaving!
1�Good. Good. Hoot!It is as we be asking for!Now you be going!
1�No weapon yet? No weapon yet?Me be wanting weapon like Eyy Mon the Ironbreaker be using!Hoot!
1�Me be keeper of treasure chamber. Hoot!Me be differing from brethren in not liking to fight.Smoothskin have no business here! Should leave now!
1�These ��books�� you smoothskins read, I am finding them very interesting.Book-book-book!

1�Ack-ack-ack!�%����!Here, you are taking book.
1�Books good, but %���� are better!Ack-ack-ack!
1�You want to be seeing Vaa Huja the Erudite?Funny smoothskin you are.Ack-ack-ack!
1�What you say, ��it takes one to know one?��The one you are seeking, strange he is.Hates the #����.Just the smell is ruffling his feathers.
1�The #����?Me, I am more than happy to be taking!
1�Ack-ack-ack!For you I am telling.Vaa Huja the Erudite is reading book in hole, far south.
1�But way he is, by sneaking or creeping, you not getting close to him, I know.

1�There is an offering bag with the seal of Windurst on it.
1�An offering from Windurst sits here.Retrieve the offering.Leave it alone.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�What story would you like to be told?No, thank you.All events.
1�What story would you like to be told?No, thank you.Zhuu Buxu's Gambit.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
